decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing the Birthing Pod card to tutor and sacrifice creatures in order to generate value and create powerful combinations. It includes a toolbox of creatures with various abilities that can be brought into play at different points in the game to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes cards like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay to provide control and disruption. Gavony Township can be used to pump up the team and close out the game. The deck has a solid mana base and utilizes both green and black creatures for versatility.

The main concept of this Modern 1 vs 1 deck is to utilize a combination of creatures and Birthing Pod to create a toolbox of different creatures that can be searched for and played as needed. The deck includes a variety of powerful creatures with different abilities, such as Restoration Angel, Thragtusk, Archangel of Thune, and Siege Rhino. The deck also includes cards like Abrupt Decay and Voice of Resurgence to provide disruption and protection. Additionally, the deck includes Gavony Township and Razorverge Thicket to provide additional utility and mana fixing.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Amulet of Vigor and Summer Bloom to play Primeval Titan and search for key lands like Vesuva and Sunhome, Fortress of the Legion. Azusa, Lost but Seeking helps generate additional land drops, while Hive Mind can create a lockout situation by forcing opponents to copy your spells. The deck also includes various pacts for protection and disruption, as well as utility lands like Tolaria West and Ghost Quarter. Overall, the strategy revolves around assembling the Amulet Titan combo to overwhelm opponents with big threats and efficient land plays.

The main idea of this deck is to use Jeskai Ascendancy to generate huge amounts of mana and card advantage by untapping creatures and drawing cards every time a noncreature spell is cast. By combining this with cantrips, counterspells, and removal, the deck aims to find and play its win conditions quickly and efficiently. The deck's goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a powerful combo that can be difficult to disrupt once it starts going off.

This Temur Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Delver of Secrets while controlling the board with counterspells like Mana Leak and Spell Pierce. The deck also utilizes card draw spells like Serum Visions and Treasure Cruise to maintain card advantage and keep up the pressure. Tarmogoyf serves as a powerful threat that can quickly grow in size, while burn spells like Lightning Bolt provide additional reach to close out games. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure a quick victory.

This deck focuses on using Jeskai Ascendancy to generate a powerful combo that allows you to untap creatures repeatedly and draw through your deck quickly. By utilizing cards like Manamorphose, Thought Scour, and Treasure Cruise, you can cycle through your deck to find your win condition. Glittering Wish acts as a versatile tutor, while Birds of Paradise, Fatestitcher, and Sylvan Caryatid provide mana acceleration and creature support. With careful sequencing and timing, you can create an overwhelming advantage to overwhelm your opponent and secure the win.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive plays. By using efficient burn spells and creatures with haste, the goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Eidolon of the Great Revel. The deck aims to control the board early on and finish the game before the opponent can stabilize. With a focus on fast, high-damage plays, this deck is designed to close out games in a quick and decisive manner.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy, using cheap and efficient artifacts creatures. The deck aims to quickly accumulate an overwhelming board presence through cards like Myr Enforcer, Frogmite, and Arcbound Ravager. The deck also utilizes equipment like Cranial Plating and Scale of Chiss-Goria to enhance the power and toughness of its creatures. Additionally, the deck includes synergistic artifacts like Springleaf Drum, Mox Opal, and Welding Jar to help with mana acceleration and protection. Overall, the deck focuses on quickly deploying a formidable army of artifact creatures to secure victory.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to maintain control of the board through counterspells like Mana Leak and Spell Snare, while quickly deploying threats such as Delver of Secrets, Young Pyromancer, and Monastery Swiftspear. The deck also utilizes card draw with Treasure Cruise and Gitaxian Probe to maintain tempo and pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to win the game by dealing direct damage with Lightning Bolt and other burn spells while efficiently using the graveyard as a resource with cards like Thought Scour and Snapcaster Mage.

The key concept of this deck is to quickly and aggressively apply pressure on the opponent while efficiently controlling the game through countermagic and tempo plays. By utilizing cheap spells and cantrips to fuel card advantage and prowess triggers, the deck aims to maintain a fast clock and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Tarmogoyf and Delver of Secrets provide additional threats to close out the game, while Snapcaster Mage allows for extra value and flexibility in spell choices. Overall, the deck aims to win by overwhelming the opponent before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on utilizing cheap spells and creatures to apply constant pressure on the opponent while maintaining card advantage through cards like Gitaxian Probe and Treasure Cruise. It aims to control the board early with counterspells like Spell Snare and remand while also dealing direct damage with Lightning Bolt and Tarmogoyf. The deck also benefits from the synergy between Young Pyromancer and cheap spells, creating an army of tokens. Overall, the deck aims to be fast, aggressive, and disruptive in order to overwhelm the opponent quickly.

The main theme of this deck revolves around using counter spells, removal, and card draw to control the game and disrupt the opponent's strategy. With cards like Cryptic Command, Snapcaster Mage, and Vendilion Clique, the deck aims to control the board while keeping the opponent's threats at bay. The inclusion of cards like Blood Moon and Vedalken Shackles also allows for additional disruption and control over the game's dynamics. Overall, the key strategy of this deck is to outlast the opponent and maintain control of the game until victory is achieved.

The deck focuses on using Birthing Pod to tutor for and play various creatures that have synergistic abilities, creating a toolbox of options to disrupt the opponent's strategy and gain advantage in the game. The creatures in the deck range from removal options like Nekrataal and Sin Collector, to combo pieces like Spike Feeder and Archangel of Thune. The mana acceleration provided by cards like Noble Hierarch and Birds of Paradise allows for quick and efficient plays, while Gavony Township provides a way to pump up creatures for a strong finish.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly ramp up mana and cast aggressive creatures like Geist of Saint Traft, Tarmogoyf, and Wild Nacatl, supported by burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lightning Helix. The deck's strategy revolves around dealing damage as quickly as possible and overwhelming the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells. By utilizing fetch lands and mana dorks like Noble Hierarch, the deck aims to consistently hit its mana requirements and establish a strong board presence early in the game.

This deck focuses on combining efficient creature threats like Siege Rhino, Tarmogoyf, and Scavenging Ooze with disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Abrupt Decay to apply pressure on the opponent. The deck aims to control the board early on with removal spells and hand disruption before closing out the game with powerful midrange threats. By utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and establish a dominant board presence to secure victory in the mid to late game.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures backed up by disruption and removal spells. The key strategy is to apply pressure early with efficient threats like Tarmogoyf and Siege Rhino while disrupting the opponent's game plan with Thoughtseize, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Abrupt Decay. Lingering Souls provides additional value by creating multiple flyers, and Liliana of the Veil helps control the board and disrupt the opponent's hand. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also providing utility lands like Gavony Township and Stirring Wildwood.
